text: Route of the 1986 Tour de France The 1986 Tour de France was the 73rd edition of Tour de France, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Tour began in Boulogne- Billancourt with a prologue individual time trial on 4 July and Stage 11 occurred on 14 July with a flat stage to Bordeaux. The race finished on the Champs-Élysées in Paris on 27 July. ==Prologue== 4 July 1986 — Boulogne- Billancourt, (individual time trial) {| |Prologue result and general classification after prologue {| class="wikitable" |- !
